article.title: Integration with JavaEE Security
article.para: To use JavaEE Authentication for JPA Security you may integrate JPA Security like described in the previous chapter and specify net.sf.jpasecurity.security.authentication.EjbAuthenticationProvider as authentication provider in your persistence properties. You need to define all the roles your application is using with the @DeclareRoles annotation at at least one of your entity beans in order to make the EjbAuthenticationProvider to work correctly.
